mapper.select: select t.`*`,u2.name creatorname,u.name operatorname,u3.name auditorname,me.name paymethod, m.sku,m.name mname,p.location image,f.number purnumber from t_erp_purchase_fin_form t LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.id=t.operator LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u2 ON u2.id=t.creator LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u3 ON u3.id=t.auditor LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form_payment_method me ON me.id=t.payment_method left join t_erp_purchase_form_entry e on e.id=t.entryid left join t_erp_material m on m.id=e.materialid left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form f ON f.id=e.formid where t.id=#{formid,jdbcType=CHAR}
